title: Covid Tracker
summary: Covid Tracker was designed as a front end application retrieving and displaying data from an remote API using Bootstrap, Bulma, and jQuery.

title: Burger Devourer
summary: Burger Devourer was designed to make use of Handlebars.

title: Parrot Passion
summary: Parrot Passion is designed to be a full stack e-commerce application.

title: Password Generator
summary: Password Generator was designed to practice the logic of generating random passwords.

title: Weather App
summary: Weather App was disigned with Bootstrap and jQuery, and was intended to practice making use of data retrieved from Ajax calls.

title: Employee Directory
summary: Employee Directory was built using React and Bootstrap to sort, search, and display data retrieved from an Axios call.
